articles.title: Neil Young Scorches Donald Trump In New Editorial: ‘It’s ICE Cold Here in America’ - Rolling Stone

articles.content:
Neil Young kicked off the new year by scorching Donald Trump in a new op-ed on his official website, the Neil Young Archives.
